tool.name: SNVdetect
tool.description: - detect single nucleotide variants from data set pairs
tool.command:
snvdetect.py
## Inputs --chr_length=$chr_length --input1_alleleqc=$input1_alleleqc --input2_alleleqc=$input2_alleleqc --snvtest=$snvtest
## Check if using default or custom parameters --default_full_settings_type=$default_full_settings.settings_type #if $default_full_settings.settings_type == "full" --min_depth=$min_depth --max_depth=$max_depth --max_copy_num=$max_copy_num --pvalue_rank_sum=$pvalue_rank_sum --pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_repetitive_hits=$pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_repetitive_hits --pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_read_ends=$pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_read_ends --relax_depth_requirement=$relax_depth_requirement --min_allele_freq=$min_allele_freq --allele_freq_requirement=$allele_freq_requirement --max_allele_freq=$max_allele_freq --pvalue_somatic_mut_detection=$pvalue_somatic_mut_detection #end if
## Output file --output=$output

param.name: settings_type
param.label: SNVdetect settings to use
param.help: Default settings are suitable for most analyses. If you want full control, use Full parameter list

param.name: pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_repetitive_hits
param.label: p-value cutoff for mismatch enrichment test on repetitive hits

param.name: pvalue_rank_sum
param.label: p-value cutoff for quality rank sum test

param.name: pvalue_mismatch_enrichment_read_ends
param.label: p-value cutoff for mismatch enrichment test on 5' or 3' end of reads

param.name: relax_depth_requirement
param.label: Relax the depth requirement
param.help: If this parameter was not given, sites which unique aligned reads less than minimum depth requirement would be filtered

param.name: allele_freq_requirement
param.label: Allele frequency requirement for confident genotype call

param.name: max_allele_freq
param.label: Maximum allowed mutant allele frequency in normal for somatic mutation detection

param.name: pvalue_somatic_mut_detection
param.label: p-value cutoff for somatic mutation detection

tool.help:
**What it does**
SNVdetect detects single nucleotide variants from pairs of data sets. The results of this tool is the final result of the SOAPsnv process to detect single nucleotide variants.
**More information**
For test data and more detailed information, click here_.
.. _here: http://soap.genomics.org.cn/SOAPsnv.html
